programme.title: Arsenal vs. Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Arsenal have won two of their last four league meetings with Manchester City, as many as their previous 22 beforehand. The Gunners could win back-to-back league games against the Citizens for the first time since December 2015. Manchester City have lost both of their last two Premier League visits to Arsenal, as many as their previous 14 beforehand. It’s their longest losing run away to the Gunners since April 2009.

programme.title: Manchester United vs. Chelsea - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013. Indeed, Chelsea’s win rate of 18% at Old Trafford in the Premier League is their lowest away to any side they have visited 10+ times in the competition. After their 1-0 win in May, Chelsea are looking for successive league victories over Manchester United for the first time since winning three in a row from November 2009 to March 2011 under Carlo Ancelotti. The Blues’ two wins in their last three league games versus the Red Devils are as many as their previous 17 beforehand.

programme.title: Liverpool vs. Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 28 home games against Everton in all competitions, winning each of their last four in a row since a 0-2 defeat in February 2021. Only from February 1933 to January 1937 have the Reds ever won five straight home matches against the Toffees. Everton have won just two of their last 29 Premier League Merseyside derbies against Liverpool and have failed to score in five of their last seven.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs PSG - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 5
programme.desc: Marseille and Paris SG will face each other for the 110th time in all competitions, the Parisian club having only played more against Monaco and Lyon. Marseille are winless in their last 12 home games against Paris SG in Ligue 1, their longest drought against a single opponent – thats more games without a win than in their first 33 home games against PSG. OM have not scored at the Velodrome against their rivals for six L1 matches, also their longest streak against the same team.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Espanyol - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 5
programme.desc: Real Madrid have won 24 and drawn three of their last 27 home games against Espanyol in LaLiga, winning the last 10, the best unbeaten run and winning streak at home against Espanyol in their history in the competition. Espanyol have lost 108 of their 178 matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga, the highest number of defeats suffered by any team against another in the history of the competition.

programme.title: Brighton and Hove Albion vs Tottenham Hotspur - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 5 - Mini match
programme.desc: Brighton completed a Premier League double over Tottenham Hotspur last season – the only time they have ever won back-to-back league meetings with Spurs. Tottenham Hotspur have lost away to Brighton in both of the last two league seasons but have never before lost three successive visits.

Arturo Coello (Esp) Agustin Tapia (Arg) vs Alejandro Galan (Esp) Federico Chingotto (Arg) - Men - Fi
programme.desc: Roland-Garros, Philippe-Chatrier. World No.1s Arturo Coello/Agustín Tapia face No.2 Alejandro Galán/Fede Chingotto for Major glory and 2,000 FIP points. Coello/Tapia arrive after straight sets win over Stupaczuk/Lebron; Galán/Chingotto advanced by shutting down Yanguas/Nieto. Expect Coello/Tapia’s aerial power vs Galán/Chingotto’s countering and first-volley precision. Serve+1 and bandeja depth decide.

programme.title: Race 1 - Formula 4 Italy - Barcelona Round - 2025
programme.desc: Opening sprint where grid spot helps, but nerve at Turn 1 and tidy lines through T3/T9 decide early gains. In big fields, Safety Cars are common—composure on restarts and strong exits to the main straight are essential. Clean laps, minimal penalties and measured aggression convert pace into first-day silverware.

programme.title: Gemma Triay Pons (Esp) Delfina Brea Senesi (Arg) vs Marta Ortega Gallego (Esp) Tamara Icardo Alcoris

Expect Triay/Brea’s aggressive shifts and overhead control against Ortega/Icardo’s structured patterns and backhand-volley accuracy. Net duels and smart lobs will tell.

programme.title: My Faith in Sport - Salah
programme.desc: Exploring the importance of prayer within Islam, the episode begins with an overview of our seven athletes as they introduce themselves and why Islam is so important to them. We are also introduced to Omar Sulieman, a notable Imam, who acts as narration throughout the series and a guiding voice on the key principles of Islam. The life and career of Sofyan Amrabat is explored, showcasing his role as a key part of the Fenerbahce team in Turkey and the Moroccan national side. The Atlas Lions’ run to the semi-finals of the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 is explored, with the impact that Salah played in the team’s belief and positivity throughout the tournament.

programme.desc: The previous meetings between PAOK Salonika and Maccabi Tel Aviv were in qualifying for the 2004-05 UEFA Champions League – the Israeli side won both legs in the third qualifying round. Maccabi Tel Aviv’s only previous major European trip to Greece came in the 2023-24 UEFA Conference League, winning 4-1 at Olympiakos in the first leg. They lost the second leg 6-1 at home and were eliminated at the last 16 stage.

programme.title: Real Betis vs Nottingham Forest - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first ever meeting between Real Betis and Nottingham Forest – the Spanish side have lost seven of nine previous European games against English teams, losing most recently in the 2025 UEFA Conference League final to Chelsea. programme.title: Go Ahead Eagles vs FCSB - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: Go Ahead Eagles are featuring a major European competition for the first time since the 1965-66 Cup Winners’ Cup first round, when they were eliminated 7-0 on aggregate by Celtic. FCSB have won just one of their seven away major European matches in the Netherlands, beating SC Heerenveen 3-1 in the UEFA Cup in February 2006.

programme.title: Amiens vs St-etienne - French Ligue 2 - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Ligue 2 is the second division of French football. Ligue 2 is contested by 18 clubs, the league operates on a system of promotion and relegation with both Ligue 1 and the third division Championnat National. The teams play 34 games each, totaling 306 games in the season. The biggest games from each match Day are live and exclusive on beIN.

programme.desc: Malmo and Ludogorets have met twice before in European competition, with the Swedish side advancing 3-2 on aggregate from a UEFA Champions League qualifying play-off tie in August 2021. programme.title: Reims vs Clermont - French Ligue 2 - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Ligue 2 is the second division of French football. programme.desc: Sporting Braga and Feyenoord have never previously faced – Braga’s last European meeting with a Dutch side was in 2015-16 in the UEFA Europa League group stage, winning 1-0 at home and drawing 0-0 away at FC Groningen. programme.title: Freiburg vs Basel - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD1
programme.desc: SC Freiburg and Basel have never previously faced in any competition – Freiburg’s two previous games against Swiss opposition came in the 2001-02 UEFA Cup second round, losing 1-0 at home but winning 4-1 away at St. Gallen to progress on aggregate. Basel’s most recent major European meetings with a German side came in the 2019-20 UEFA Europa League last 16, winning 3-0 away and 1-0 at home against Eintracht Frankfurt.

programme.title: Chambery vs Nantes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germains 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Al Ahli vs Al Rayyan - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W5
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: History of the Asian Games
programme.desc: From its beginnings to today, the Asian Games torch lighting has become a dazzling showcase of creativity and technology. Each edition brings fresh innovation, with Doha 2006’s unforgettable horse-and-rider moment still hailed as a highlight. As the 2026 Games in Japan draw near, excitement builds over what new spectacle will capture the world’s imagination.

programme.title: The Art of lighting the Asian Games Flame
programme.desc: The Asian Games torch lighting has become a stage for innovation, blending tradition with modern spectacle. From iconic moments to dazzling surprises, none stand out more than Doha 2006 with its dramatic horse and rider. As the 2026 Games approach in Japan, anticipation grows for the next unforgettable torch lighting ceremony.
